SEARCH
Package oop

Class HMS

java.lang.Object
oop.HMS
public class HMS extends Object
The HMS class represents the main controller for the Hospital Management System. It handles user authentication, staff management, appointment scheduling, inventory management, and various other hospital operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    HMS(String authFilePath)
    Constructs a new HMS instance by initializing controllers and loading authentication data.

  • Constructor Details

    • HMS

      public HMS(String authFilePath) throws IOException
      Constructs a new HMS instance by initializing controllers and loading authentication data.
      Parameters:
      authFilePath - the file path to the authentication data file
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading authentication data

  • Method Details

    • initializeSystem

      public void initializeSystem()
      Initializes the system by loading staff, patients, and medication data from Excel files. This method should be called after constructing the HMS instance to ensure all data is loaded.

    • login

      public User login(String hospitalID, String password, Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Handles user login authentication. If the user's password is the default, it forces the user to change the password.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - the hospital ID of the user attempting to log in
      password - the password provided by the user
      scanner - a Scanner object for reading user input
      Returns:
      the authenticated User object if login is successful; null otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during authentication

    • manageHospitalStaff

      public void manageHospitalStaff()
      Allows the administrator to manage hospital staff, including adding, updating, and removing staff members. Displays the current staff list and prompts the administrator for an action.

    • viewAppointmentDetails

      public void viewAppointmentDetails() throws IOException
      Views appointment details by delegating to the AppointmentController.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while retrieving appointment details

    • manageMedicationInventory

      public void manageMedicationInventory(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Manages the medication inventory by displaying current inventory and allowing the administrator to add, update, or remove medications.
      Parameters:
      scanner - a Scanner object for reading user input
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing the medication data

    • viewPatientRecords

      public void viewPatientRecords() throws IOException
      Views patient records (doctors can only see their patients' records).
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing patient records

    • updatePatientRecords

      public void updatePatientRecords() throws IOException
      Updates patient records by delegating to the UserController.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while updating patient records

    • updateDoctorAvailability

      public void updateDoctorAvailability(Doctor doctor, Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Updates or deletes a doctor's availability in the system.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the Doctor whose availability is to be updated
      scanner - the Scanner object used to read user input
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing the Excel file

      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while managing appointments

    • submitReplenishmentRequest

      public void submitReplenishmentRequest(Pharmacist pharmacist) throws IOException
      Submits a replenishment request for medication that is low in stock.
      Parameters:
      pharmacist - the Pharmacist submitting the request
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while submitting the request

    • approveReplenishmentRequests

      public void approveReplenishmentRequests() throws IOException
      Approves pending replenishment requests and updates the medication stock accordingly.

      This method performs the following actions:

      • Displays all pending replenishment requests.
      • Allows the administrator to select a request to approve.
      • Updates the status of the selected request to "approved".
      • Updates the medication stock in the inventory based on the approved request.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing the Excel files

    • updatePatientInfoInExcel

      public void updatePatientInfoInExcel(Patient patient) throws IOException
      Updates patient information in the Excel file.
      Parameters:
      patient - the Patient whose information needs to be updated
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing the Excel file

    • viewReplenishmentRequests

      public void viewReplenishmentRequests(Pharmacist pharmacist) throws IOException
      Allows a pharmacist to view their replenishment requests and their statuses.
      Parameters:
      pharmacist - the Pharmacist whose requests are to be viewed
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing the Excel file

    • handleOutstandingBills

      public void handleOutstandingBills(Patient patient) throws IOException
      Handles outstanding bills for a patient by allowing them to view and pay unpaid appointments.
      Parameters:
      patient - the Patient whose outstanding bills are to be handled
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing the Excel file

    • sendInvoice

      public void sendInvoice(Pharmacist pharmacist) throws IOException
      Sends an invoice to patients by changing the status of completed appointments to "unpaid" and adding the invoice amount.
      Parameters:
      pharmacist - the Pharmacist who is sending the invoice
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing the Excel file

    • findLastAppointmentID

      public String findLastAppointmentID() throws IOException
      Finds the last appointment ID by delegating to the AppointmentController.
      Returns:
      the last appointment ID as a String
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing appointment data
